name: Eaton Corporation
membership: CLEPA – European trade association of suppliers to the transportation industry
goal: Eaton provides energy-efficient solutions that help our customers effectively manage electrical, hydraulic and mechanical power more efficiently, safely and sustainably. Eaton has approximately 96,000 employees and sells products to customers in more than 175 countries.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Eaton is also working in the area of emissions reductions, in particular Euro 7/VII regulations and zero- and  low-emission vehicles, with products that span internal combustion engine breathing technologies, electrified powertrains ranging between mild hybrids and fully electrical powertrains, and high efficiency transmissions. Eaton is engaging with the Commissions’ Motor Vehicle Emissions Group as a stakeholder in the initial discussions around stricter non-CO2 emissions.
